# US Census Data

## Organization
US Census Bureau

## Website
www.census.gov/

## Description
*	Census conducted every 10 years to determine the number of people living in US 
*	Demographic data, housing, social and economic data

## Vintage/Release Frequency
Decennial since 1790

## Observational Unit
Respondent-level for microdata but various geographic level summaries available

## Collection Methodology
National census

## Available at
https://www.census.gov/programs-surveys/decennial-%20census/data/datasets.html

## User Guide/Data Dictionary
https://www.census.gov/programs-surveys/decennial-%20census/data/datasets.html

## Cost
Free for download

## Proposal or Application required?
No

## DUA required?
No

## Special Notes
Several tools are available for finding and using census data are available at https://www.census.gov/data/data-tools.html
